result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for managing device-related operations within a service.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating device management functionality through client and model definitions.

internal/infras/devicemanager/client.go.purpose: This file implements an internal client for managing device-related operations in a service.

internal/infras/devicemanager/models.go.purpose: Defines models and types for managing devices in a device manager service.
